email.subject: New $P{ClientCompany} Company was created to Compelligence
email.message:
New $P{ClientCompany} Company was Created

  • Company Name: $P{ClientCompany}.
  • Company Domain: http://$P{Domain}.compelligence.com
  • Company Address: $P{Email}.

  • Company City: $P{City}.
  • Company State: $P{State}.
  • Company ZipCode: $P{ZipCode}.
  • Company Phone: $P{Phone}.
  • Company Description: $P{Description}.
  • Created Date: $P{CreatedDate}.

  • User Email: $P{UserEmail}.
